message: Heard some rumblings about Apple's removal of Rosetta and all ppc support. I think it's great they supported it as long as they did but it no longer makes sense to continue spending the resources on it.
PPC hardware support was completely removed in 10.6.
That was needed for a while because, at first, most apps hadn't switched yet.
@kennethreitz then why is Lion's Rosetta killing such a big deal?
Because in 10.6 you can run apps that are compiled for ppc on intel hardware.
Even iTunes when 10.5 came out was build only PPC i *think*.
But that trend is long gone, they should drop it.
